reviewText: Awful.  Please do not waste your money; keep it in thy purse.  "Thy" becomes "your"--plot, acting, & character are contemptible.  But the Muslim crescent & star are emphasized.  It is interpreted & played as unworthy soap-opera actors who speak English as a second language. I was disgusted.  When I think of Olivier's magnificent performance, still the best rendering & directing of "Othello," this muck turned my stomach.
